section.p:
If you have the codeword Fright, .
Otherwise, read on below.

You climb up to the first balcony and slip in through a narrow window. The interior of the tower is an architect’s nightmare of long shadows, twisting stairs and crazy angles. In the top-most chamber you see a giant dozing in a chair. Treasure lies in heaps around his feet, but you must be careful not to wake him.

Make a THIEVERY roll at a Difficulty of 16
if you decide to risk it.
